metadata.Title: CVE-2020-19144 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - negligible
metadata.Description:
Buffer Overflow in LibTiff v4.0.10 allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice via the 'in _TIFFmemcpy' funtion in the component 'tif_unix.c'.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-19144` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.1
libtiff-tools - 4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.1
libtiff5 - 4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.1
libtiffxx5 - 4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.1').
